content.thinking: I need to carefully extract information from this Colombian identification document (Cédula de Ciudadanía). Let me analyze the document systematically following the extraction workflow. ## Step 1: Document Structure Analysis This document appears to be a Colombian national ID card ("Cédula de Ciudadanía") based on the header "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA". It's an official government-issued identification document. The document is in Spanish and follows the typical Colombian ID card format with: - Front side showing personal information and photo - Back side showing additional details like birth information, height, blood type, etc. ## Step 2: Dual-Mode Field Detection Let me locate and extract the key fields: **Front side (page 1):** - "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA" - Header indicating country of issue - "IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL" - Document type description - "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA" - Specific document type - "NUMERO: 76319806" - Identification number - "MARTINEZ FERNANDEZ" - Appears under "APELLIDOS" (surnames/last name) - "JUAN MANUEL" - Appears under "NOMBRES" (given names/first name) **Back side (page 2):** - "FECHA DE NACIMIENTO: 17-AGO-1973" - Birth date - "POPAYAN (CAUCA)" - Birth place - "LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO" - Birth place label - "1.83" - Height - "O+" - Blood type - "M" - Sex (Male) - "16-JUL-1992 POPAYAN" - Issue date and place - "FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICION" - Issue date and place label ## Step 3: Pattern-Based Text Extraction Based on the visible field labels: - firstName: "JUAN MANUEL" (from "NOMBRES" section) - lastName: "MARTINEZ FERNANDEZ" (from "APELLIDOS" section) - country_issuer: "Colombia" (from "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA" header) - nationality: "Colombia" (default assumption since this is a citizenship document) - identificationType: "Cédula de Ciudadanía" (directly stated on document) - identificationNumber: "76319806" (from "NUMERO" section) ## Step 4: Field Mapping and Validation All required fields can be clearly extracted. The document is a Colombian "Cédula de Ciudadanía" which confirms Colombian citizenship. ## Step 5: Quality Control and Output The extraction appears complete and accurate. Let me format the final JSON output per the schema: ```json { "result": { "firstName": "JUAN MANUEL", "lastName": "MARTINEZ FERNANDEZ", "country_issuer": "Colombia", "nationality": "Colombia", "identificationType": "Cédula de Ciudadanía", "identificationNumber": "76319806", "message": "" }, "document_type": "person", "category": "CECRL" } ``` I've verified all fields are present and accurately extracted according to the document. Since there were no extraction issues, the message field is empty.
